question: Please analyze this URL https://spoil.weshopist.life/
thought: Access the URL to get the status code Extract the text in the HTML and analyze it for scam website characteristics The text contains a lot of product listings, many of which are being offered at unusually low prices. The phone number and email address are not shown on the website. The website does not provide any contact information, such as a phone number or email address. I now know the final answer I should first check the status code of the URL using AccessURL. I should now check the text and links on the website using ExtractText and ExtractHyperlink. I now know the final answer {

answer.reason: Unusually low prices and claims of free shipping inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
